## ams.amc remote set-url

Set the URL of an existing remote

```
ams.amc remote set-url <name> <URL> [flags]
```

### Examples

```
$ amc remote add foo https://192.0.2.10:8444
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for set-url
```
